## GridInitializer interface

Initializer that is used for initialization (restoring) of grid data and grid plugins data

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GridInitializer extends GridPlugin 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getItemsPerPage()](./grid.gridinitializer.getitemsperpage.md) | Gets stored items per page |
|  [getOrdering()](./grid.gridinitializer.getordering.md) | Gets stored ordering |
|  [getPage()](./grid.gridinitializer.getpage.md) | Gets stored page |
|  [setItemsPerPage(itemsPerPage)](./grid.gridinitializer.setitemsperpage.md) | Sets current items per page when changed |
|  [setOrdering(ordering)](./grid.gridinitializer.setordering.md) | Sets current ordering when changed |
|  [setPage(page)](./grid.gridinitializer.setpage.md) | Sets current page when changed |
